derivation: a primitive root; to become sapless through drought; used only as denominative from H7179 (קַשׁ);
outline:
1. to gather, assemble, collect, gather stubble or sticks
    1. (Qal) to gather together
    2. (Poel) to gather stubble
    3. (Hithpoel) to gather oneself together
strongs_def: to forage for straw, stubble or wood; figuratively, to assemble
